name: Oribiki
summary: Oribiki is removing sediment by transferring clear liquid to another vessel.

name: Orisage
summary: Orisage is leaving the liquid still to settle remaining solids after filtration.

name: Fukurozuri (bag-hanging press)
summary: Fukurozuri is a method where moromi is hung in bags to drip, collecting sake without pressure.

name: Tobin-dori
